description: Episode number 3 of Series "Climate & man". Global Warming and the Greenhouse Effect are no longer unknown scientific concepts. They affect all people on the globe, and the prevention of further deterioration of the environment and atmosphere are critical issues facing governments. This comprehensive examination of the the causes and implications of greenhouse and global warming also looks at possible strategies which will in time slow down the devastation caused by these phenomena.
